text: Varennes-sur-Amance is a commune in the Haute-Marne department in north- eastern France. Between 1972 and 2012 it was part of the commune Terre-Natale. It was the place of birth of novelist and critic Marcel Arland. ==See also== *Communes of the Haute-Marne department ==References== Category:Communes of Haute-Marne
title: Varennes-sur-Amance
